issue.title: Provide and document option to explicitly disable configuration/compilation/installation of library components

content.raw: I just noticed that the `SKIP_<component>` variable used in [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/ca665459dbe2677ec89625fc4740403a2704f4a6/cmake/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake?at=ign-cmake1#lines-190](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/ca665459dbe2677ec89625fc4740403a2704f4a6/cmake/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake?at=ign-cmake1#lines-190) , that should satisfy the need of this issue. I did not find it without inspecting the source code, so either I missed it from the documentation, or otherwise to solve the issue we just need to document this option.
